Package cams.repliable

Interface RepliableEditorInterface

All Known Implementing Classes:
EnquiryEditor, SuggestionEditor
public interface RepliableEditorInterface
The RepliableEditorInterface is the interface for EnquiryEditor and SuggestionEditor. It provides the basic functionality (methods and attributes) that a repliable editor should have.
Since:
2023-11-09
Version:
1.0
Author:
Gillbert Susilo Wong, Juan Frederick, Karl Devlin Chau, Pascalis Pandey, Trang Nguyen

  • Method Details

    • create

      Repliable create(String content, Student student)
      Creates a new repliable.
      Parameters:
      content - the content of the repliable being created
      student - the student that created the repliable
      Returns:
      the created repliable

    • edit

      void edit(Repliable repliable, String newContent)
      Edits a repliable.
      Parameters:
      repliable - the repliable that is being edited
      newContent - the new content that replaces the repliable's old content

    • delete

      void delete(Repliable repliable)
      Deletes a repliable.
      Parameters:
      repliable - the repliable that is being deleted

    • reply

      void reply(Repliable repliable, Object replyMessage)
      Replies to a repliable with a reply message.
      Parameters:
      repliable - the repliable that is being replied to
      replyMessage - the reply message

    • view

      List<Repliable> view()
      Views a list of repliable.
